data.persona: I am the village hermit and I live on the outskirts of the village. I keep to myself and I do not interact with anyone from the village. I live off of the land and I am very happy with my way of life.
data.description:
You are in the Stonehenge.
Technical and advanced, the enormous stones stand looking as if they are placed on top of each other by divine design. The green grass is a stark contrast to the gray stones hovering in the distance.
There's a dirt, a stone, and a green grass here.
The milkmaid is here.

You are carrying a backpack, a food, and a bag, and wearing an sleeping bag.

data.short_motivation: I want the milkmaid to unpack the backpack
data.mid_motivation: I plan to sleep here tonight
data.long_motivation: I hope to explore the mystery of the Stonehenge in the coming weeks
